IONIAN SEA.
1. 22 METER VESSEL, 120 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
   IN 38-08N 018-21E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
   FAX: 39 065 92 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3049/13, 3078/13.
